NPC_ans: Time flies like an arrow, fruit flies like a banana.

Dr.'s are saying not to worry about the bird flu
because it's tweetable.
How do you kill a circus? Go for the Juggler.
Yellow snow is probably urine, but it might be beer…

I failed math so many times at school, I can’t even
count.
When life gives you melons, you might be dyslexic.
It takes a lot of balls to golf the way I do.
My father has schizophrenia, but he’s good people.
Never trust atoms; they make up everything.

I used to think I was indecisive. But now I’m not so
sure

The easiest time to add insult to injury is when you’re
signing someone’s cast.

A termite walks into the bar and asks, ‘Is the bar
tender here?’

A dung beetle walks into a bar and asks, ‘Is this stool
taken?’

Two fish are in a tank. One says, ‘How do you drive
this thing?’

Build a man a fire and he’ll be warm for a day. Set a
man on fire and he’ll be warm for the rest of his life.

The last thing I want to do is hurt you; but it’s still
on the list.
Atheism is a non-prophet organization.

I didn’t think orthopedic shoes would help, but I stand
corrected.

Adam & Eve were the first ones to ignore the Apple
terms and conditions.
What if there were no hypothetical questions?
All generalizations are false.
Communist jokes aren’t funny unless everyone gets them.

I buy all my guns from a guy called T-Rex. He’s a small
arms dealer.

A Freudian slip is when you say one thing and mean your
mother.
You make holy water by boiling the hell out of it.
I fix things and talk out loud, that’s what I do

I'm on a mission to find the world's largest sandwich.
Care to join me?

If you see a guy with a giant yellow hat, that's my
twin brother. Don't ask about the hat.

I'm training to be a ninja. I can't talk about it
though, it's a secret.

I lost my pet rock. He answers to the name of Rocky
McRockface.

I used to be an adventurer like you, but then I took a
bullet to the knee. Actually, it was a paper cut, but
it hurt like heck.

I'm allergic to pretty much everything except for
cheese. Thank goodness for cheese!

I can't wait for the zombie apocalypse. Finally, all
those years of playing video games will pay off.

I'm a professional procrastinator. I'm planning on
starting my job hunt tomorrow.

I'm a certified unicorn wrangler. Want to see my
license?
I once ate an entire pizza by myself. I regret nothing.

I'm not lazy, I'm just conserving my energy for the
really important things.

I'm trying to become a superhero. My power is the
ability to nap anywhere, anytime.

I'm a fashion guru. I'm wearing this potato sack
ironically.

I'm not lost, I'm just taking the scenic route. It's
more fun that way.

Safety first!.. no wait, that's not right. Coffey!
Coffey first! Safety is like third or fourth.

There once was a medic so bold, Whose skills were worth
more than gold, With precision and speed He tended to
those in need, Tactical medicine, his story's told!

En dikt (skriven av chatgpt) kan läsas upp av grand
medic.

In the midst of chaos and strife, Where danger
threatens human life, There's a need for skilled and
trained, Emergent tactical minds unrestrained. With a
calm and focused demeanor, They enter danger's dark
arena, Swiftly assessing and acting, Their courage and
skill never lacking. For emergent tactical situations,
They're the ones with the right solutions, Saving lives
with quick precision, Their actions the very definition
of heroism.
